animationInstall:
${{name}}: -anim-{{name}}
.#{${{name}}}
	-webkit-animation: #{${{name}}}-keyframes #{${{name}}-duration} ease both
	-webkit-animation-play-state: paused
	-moz-animation: #{${{name}}}-keyframes #{${{name}}-duration} ease both
	-moz-animation-play-state: paused
	-o-animation: #{${{name}}}-keyframes #{${{name}}-duration} ease both
	-o-animation-play-state: paused
	animation: #{${{name}}}-keyframes #{${{name}}-duration} ease both
	animation-play-state: paused


	&._anim-start_
		-webkit-animation-play-state: running
		-moz-animation-play-state: running
		-o-animation-play-state: running
		animation-play-state: running
animation:
@import "_animation"
${{name}}: -anim-{{name}}
.#{${{name}}}
	-webkit-animation: #{${{name}}}-keyframes #{${{name}}-duration} ease both
	-webkit-animation-play-state: paused
	-moz-animation: #{${{name}}}-keyframes #{${{name}}-duration} ease both
	-moz-animation-play-state: paused
	-o-animation: #{${{name}}}-keyframes #{${{name}}-duration} ease both
	-o-animation-play-state: paused
	animation: #{${{name}}}-keyframes #{${{name}}-duration} ease both
	animation-play-state: paused


	&._anim-start_
		-webkit-animation-play-state: running
		-moz-animation-play-state: running
		-o-animation-play-state: running
		animation-play-state: running
